sys_update_xml.name: sys_app_application_1e859a3c0f790300a19acf8ce1050e1a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_app_application"><sys_app_application action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category display_value="Smart Admin">df5d9ab00fb90300a19acf8ce1050e84</category><description>This is the module for Smart Admin app. Different mini apps are handling several major streams in the administraton of the ServiceNow instance.
1. Smart Role Remover (to be renamed a bit. Handles roles, groups, inactivity, deletion of users, ticket reassigning for inacive etc.) ((!!! VER. 1.0.1 is handling only roles and groups !!!))
2. Smart Tables ( will handle all tables cleanup. Archivign as well )
3. Smart Speeder ( will check for bottlenecks and suggest a solution. Ver 2 will handle it alone by follwoing the settings )
4. Smart Activity ( checks for  active tickets/recordsand workflows and fixes them )
X. FOR FUTURE USE</description><device_type>browser</device_type><hint>You are Smart !</hint><name>SmartAdmin</name><order/><roles>admin</roles><sys_class_name>sys_app_application</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-11 20:58:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1e859a3c0f790300a19acf8ce1050e1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Smart Admin</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_app_application_1e859a3c0f790300a19acf8ce1050e1a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-11 23:31:49</sys_updated_on><title>Smart Admin</title><view_name/></sys_app_application></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_properties_8fdbe6300ff90300a19acf8ce1050eae
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices>Default=1,Error=2,Info=3,Debug=4 </choices><description>If smart.admin.role.debugger is true , adds more info to logs + onscreen.
Default - normal log file only
Error - output of all errors on screen and log file
Info - logs + on screen info messages
Debug - debug logs + exception trace + on screen messages for error, info, etc. (where applicable)</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>smart.admin.role.debug.level</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-11 22:35:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8fdbe6300ff90300a19acf8ce1050eae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>smart.admin.role.debug.level</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_8fdbe6300ff90300a19acf8ce1050eae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-11 23:52:41</sys_updated_on><type>choicelist</type><value>1</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8fdbe6300ff90300a19acf8ce1050eae"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Basetime after which archive can happen - this is per record.
